law.catch_line: When deciding whether to provide financial assistance for a business project, the Department shall c...
law.text:
When deciding whether to provide financial assistance for a business project, the Department shall consider whether the project will be located:
in an enterprise zone or a focus area as designated under Subtitle 7 of this title; or
in a BRAC Revitalization and Incentive Zone as designated under Subtitle 13 of this title.
